original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho narūpāvacaro
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… ārammaṇe
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
